entry.title: Wednesday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: A few rain showers ending this evening then mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. High 6. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Wednesday 19 April 2023
